user_query: I'm organizing a company event and I want to incorporate some fun activities. Fetch me 3 trivia questions about 'fooddrink' from the Trivia by API-Ninjas and a game level from the Music Trivia API to entertain our employees.

TaskList.description: Fetch 3 trivia questions related to food and drink from the Trivia by API-Ninjas.
Fetch a game level from the Music Trivia API.
